short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows whether your story is scheduled for publication

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Did you ever submit that great article to that awesome publication? After submitting you dream about all the views, the comments and all the great things that this new story will bring. Except‚Ä¶ The publication does not publish your masterpiece. What's going on?

There are publications out there that schedule stories to be published later. This little extension shows you whether that's going on with your article. It actually also tells you if you have delayed publishing yourself.

This extension adds a message to the edit-story-page if your story is scheduled for publication. Nothing is displayed if it's not scheduled.
